attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the British people want to know whether there is an ongoing conflict of interest within the ranks of pro Israeli officials, Lords, Goverment officials and the media. We want a full investigation into how many pro Israeli officials, media barons, goverment officials, civil servants, political fundraisers etc.. that could create a conflict of interest at the heart of British goverment that could and would go against British ideals, desires and needs. This invetsigation should include corruption, media coercion by way of blackmailing the goverment in return for positive media reports and fundraising.
We want to know how much the pro-Israel lobbys pay and contribute towards the success of any goverment either through funds, extra curriculum work or media coercion.

rejection.details: Your petition needs a title which is a call to action
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
